title: N-Repeated Element in Size 2N Array - Hash Table - Easy - LeetCode
content:
In an array A of size 2N, there are N+1 unique elements, and exactly one of these elements is repeated N times. Return the element repeated N times.   Example 1: Input: [1,2,3,3]
Output: 3
Example 2: Input: [2,1,2,5,3,2]
Output: 2
